medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute on chronic RUQ/epigastric abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain worsened after a port placement yesterday, leading to worsening sharp RUQ abdominal pain with nausea and feeling like food was 'getting stuck'. Patient has a history of baseline RUQ sharp pain due to cancer, and son reports that the pain is similar to prior episodes but much worse. Additionally, the patient has experienced progressive weight loss over the last 3 months with decreased oral intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of gastric cancer, status post subtotal gastrectomy with Billroth I reconstruction and previous chemotherapy and radiation. Recent recurrence of cancer noted.
